channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 12th February
item.description:
PER REPAIR UNDER JOB 43117607: POTHOLE
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes ignored by workers fixing others, 12th February
item.description:
This is bizarre. Earlier this week 2 workers spent some time fixing potholes on Kenelm Rise in WInchcombe. They left several without fixing them, and even those they worked on were not completely fixed. This is a waste of our resources. The whole street is in very bad shape.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kenelm Rise, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Potholes, 12th February
item.description:
